name: maze-generator
description: A JavaScript maze generator using the depth-first search algorithm

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp src/index.html dist && browserify src/index.js --outfile dist/index.js
scripts.watch: chokidar src/**/*.js -c 'npm run dev-start' --initial 'npm run dev-start'
